content: pairs to the last pair then purl the last pair together holding both colors on side b the leading color changes you are now knitting with color b and purling with color a when there is a color change within the pattern row you simply knit the first stitch of the pair with the non-leading color and purl the second with the leading color it s easy to keep count of your pairs when you switch colors you can see the color changes bind off do a loose bind off treating each pair as one stitch holding both yarns together as with the cast on i find it neater to knit each pair tbl except for the very first pair when doing the bind-off s n now make a nice cuppa and g is e d e e t ic it c e lc e s r e t s a o c a p p u c t o h enjoy
